metadata.title: CVE-2019-1003030 jenkins-plugin-workflow-cps: Sandbox bypass in Pipeline: Groovy Plugin (SECURITY-1336(2)) (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Jenkins Workflow CPS plugin. Parsing, compilation, and script instantiations provided by a crafted Groovy script could escape the sandbox allowing users to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master. The highest risk from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
